      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077503">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077503">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077503">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077503">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077503" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077504">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077504">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077504">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077504">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;from within any database, or visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Trexler Library website
           </a>
           and search in
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass
           </a>
           on the journal title to determine if itl is available full text through our library.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077504" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077505">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077505">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077505">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find ideas for topic narrowing, along with bibliographies of recommended books and journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077505">
          <p>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <em>
             New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians
            </em>
            (Trexler Library C level call # 780.3 N532n)
            <br />
            Signed entries by experts. Authoritative source of information on composers and their music. Popular music receives less attention here.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17077505" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077507">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077507">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077507">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly books on my subject?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077507">
          <div id="boxatt17077507" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129708">
              <a id="link_20129708" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129708,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Includes scholarly books on the history of music.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129548">
              <a id="link_20129548" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129548,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129715">
              <a id="link_20129715" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129715,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14124791}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Portions or full text are available for some books. Print copies may be obtain through interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077508">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077508">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077508">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077508">
          <div id="boxatt17077508" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129550">
              <a id="link_20129550" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129550,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129814">
              <a id="link_20129814" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://web.b.ebscohost.com/ehost/search/basic?sid=ca927865-1a18-4c49-a506-9ccaef62a91b@sessionmgr198&amp;vid=1&amp;tid=2003EB" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129814,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129814}); ">
               America History and Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Good for U.S. history and culture, including popular culture, back to 1492.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129552">
              <a id="link_20129552" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129552,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Some full text may be available, especially when searching from campus where library-subscribed full text is often linked directly to Google Scholar.  The surest way to verify all points of Muhlenberg access to any full text is to run a journal title search in the library catalog for the article in question.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129553">
              <a id="link_20129553" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129553,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Good for European history and culture back to 1492.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129551">
              <a id="link_20129551" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129551,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text from peer-reviewed scholarly periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129549">
              <a id="link_20129549" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129549,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Scholarly articles on music.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077767">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077767">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077767">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate primary source material on my topic (letters, diaries, personal websites, early reviews)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077767">
          <p>
           <a href="http://www.metoperafamily.org/metopera/season/production.aspx?id=9251">
            Example
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077767" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129923">
              <a id="link_20129923" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129923,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music History II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016968}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The web can be a rich source of primary documentation. Here is an example on Phillip Glass and his opera Satyagraha
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642348" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077509">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077509">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077509">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I cite sources in a bibliography?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077509">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077509" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077510">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077510">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077510">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077510">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077510" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
